---
title: Create Sign-In Token
openapi: "POST /v2/user/{user_id}/sign_in_token"
description: Create a [Vital Sign-In Token](/wearables/sdks/authentication#vital-sign-in-token) for your mobile apps to sign in with [Vital Mobile SDKs](/wearables/sdks/authentication).
---

<RequestExample>

```shell Shell
curl --request POST \
     --url {{BASE_URL}}/v2/user/{{USER_ID}}/sign_in_token \
     --header 'Accept: application/json' \
     --header 'x-vital-api-key: <API_KEY>' \
     --header 'Content-Type: application/json' \
```

```javascript Node
const { VitalClient } = require("Vital");

const client = new VitalClient({
  api_key: <API_KEY>,
  environment: "sandbox",
  region: "us"
});

const response = await client.User.createSignInToken("{{USER_ID}}");
```

```python Python
from vital import Client

client = Client(
  api_key=<API_KEY>,
  environment="sandbox",
  region="us"
)

response = client.User.create_sign_in_token("{{USER_ID}}")
```

</RequestExample>

<ResponseExample>

```json Response
{
  "user_id": "e209947b-323e-4108-8e18-1518b80da0bd",
  "sign_in_token": ""
}
```

</ResponseExample>
